subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The exposure of Montreal Canadiens icon Bob Gainey’s private sorrow has been a public inspiration. It’s the paradox of a visible life embraced and endured gracefully by a discreet man.
snippet: The exposure of Montreal Canadiens icon Bob Gainey’s private sorrow has been a public inspiration. It’s the paradox of a visible life embraced and endured gracefully by a discreet man.
